TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void OutlookBarPaneEvents_BeforeNavigateEventHandler(OutlookBarShortcut Shortcut, out bool Cancel);
.class public auto ansi sealed OutlookBarPaneEvents_BeforeNavigateEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub OutlookBarPaneEvents_BeforeNavigateEventHandler(Shortcut As OutlookBarShortcut, ByRef Cancel As Boolean)
public delegate void OutlookBarPaneEvents_BeforeNavigateEventHandler(OutlookBarShortcut ^ Shortcut, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] bool % Cancel);

Docs.param: O atalho em que o usuário clicou.
False quando o evento ocorre. Se o procedimento de evento define este argumento como True, a pasta atual não é alterada.
Docs.summary: This is a delegate for an event in the corresponding object. After implementing a callback method for the event, use this delegate to connect the callback method to the event. If there are multiple versions of the event interface, this delegate connects the callback method for the event in the specified version of Outlook.
